title: League of legends fucked in the bum
body: Me and my cousin started a game we were in for 5 mins and we were playing fine until.. it said attempting to reconnect and we left. After about 1 minute later we were out of the game and we checked our history nothing appeared. We started a game after and in the loading screen we kept dcing and it keeps saying problems with our firewall. We went on another computer and it was fine and then we tried loggging in with my account it didnt work. we've been waiting for about 2 hours still says the same thing SOMEONE HELPS PLS!!!!

replies.body: my bronzies don't want none unless you got buns hun
